verses.roman:
bhakti kari' śire dhari tāṅhāra caraṇa
śeṣa-līlāra sūtra-gaṇa kariye varṇana

synonyms: bhakti kari'-with great devotion; śire—on my head; dhari—I hold; tāṅhāra—his; caraṇa—lotus feet; śeṣa-līlāra—of the pastimes at the end; sūtra-gaṇa—the synopsis; kariye—I do; varṇana—describe.
translation: Placing his lotus feet upon my head in great devotion, I shall now describe in summary the Lord's final pastimes.
